endStep.leftBudget: This is your budget left. Save it for the next time you visit DcaPal
endStep.budgetAllocated: Hang on! We are allocating your budget
endStep.allocationReady: Great Success! Your allocation is ready

portfolioStep.fillWithNumber: Fill <0>{{field}}</0> field with the number of <1>{{symbol}}</1> you already have in your portfolio (e.g. 10 units)
portfolioStep.defineTargetWeight: Define your desired asset allocation in <0>{{targetWeight}}</0> field (e.g. <1>{{percentage}}</1> of total portfolio value)
portfolioStep.reviewYourWeight: Review your <0>{{targetWeights}}</0> They must sum up to 100% (currently <1>{{actualWeight}} %</1>)

searchBar.placeholder: Search Crypto, ETF and much more

transactionFee.zeroFee: Enjoy your zero-fee trading life, lucky bastard
transactionFee.reviewFee: Review your <0>{{fee}}</0>. Must be less than or equal to max fee.

importStep.fetchData: Just a sec! Fetching fresh data for your portfolio

investStep.howMuchAllocate: How much you would like to allocate?
investStep.taxEfficientInfo: With <0>{{tax}}</0> option, we do our best to rebalance your portfolio using your liquidity, with buy-only suggestions. Otherwise, we might suggest to sell part of your positions.
investStep.allocateAllBudgetInfo: With <0>{{message}}</0> option, we do our best to allocate all your budget left, even if it over-weighs some assets. The algorithm prioritizes assets farther from their target allocation.
investStep.useFractionalSharesInfo: With <0>{{message}}</0> option, we are going to suggest a fractional number of shares to buy or sell for non-fractional assets like Stocks or ETFs. Choose this option only if your broker supports it.
investStep.youShouldAllocateAmount: You should allocate at least <0>{{solution}}</0> <1>{{quoteCcy}}</1> to reach your target allocation.
investStep.youAlreadyReachedTargetAllocation: You have already reached your target allocation.
investStep.loading: Computing the amount to invest to reach the target allocation...

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.quote1: But since we are here, enjoy a free Warren Buffet's quote:
notFound.quote2: ‚ÄúIf you aren't willing to own a stock for 10 years, don't even think about owning it for 10 minutes‚Äù

error.errorHasOccurred: Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred.

about.title: About
about.presentation1: <0>{{person}}</0> üëã I'm a Software Engineer in Finance, working on low-latency backend systems, mostly in C++ and Rustü¶Ä. I know, I know, but there are worse things I could do.
about.presentation2: I designed DcaPal as a <0>{{tool}}</0> for passive investors like me: financially-educated people managing their own portfolios of not-too-many assets replicating major world indices.
about.commonProblem: I was facing a common problem: it's that time of the month, got some savings to invest and have to split them across my portfolio assets.
about.questionPresentation: How the heck can I do it so that my portfolio stays balanced?
about.motivation: Hence DcaPal. You come here every week/month/quarter, build your portfolio, define asset allocation in percentage, input how much you want to invest and <0>{{algorithm}}</0>
about.letTheAlgorithmDoTheSplittingForYou: let the algorithm do the splitting for you
about.exportPortfolio: You can even export your portfolio and import it back next time to save precious minutes.
about.privacyPolicyMessage1: Here's our poor man privacy policy. We store your IP location for stats purposes. That's it. Nothing more.
about.privacyPolicyMessage2: Since DcaPal is a zero-login service, we don't do user profiling. We do not store any user data: portfolio assets, invested amounts, nothing ever leaves your browser.
about.privacyPolicyMessage3: This may change in the future. Until then, long live the Far West.
about.feedbackMessage: If you find any issue, would like to ask for new features or simply leave a feedback, <0>{{feelFree}}</0> to me on any of <1>{{socialProfiles}}</1>.
about.fellowDev: <alignSuper1>If you are a fellow Dev, don't forget to</alignSuper1> <githubStar>Star</githubStar> <alignSuper2>DcaPal on <githubLink>Github</githubLink> if you like it or drop me an</alignSuper2> <githubIssue>Issue</githubIssue> <alignSuper3>if you want to help.</alignSuper3>

underConstruction.title: Under construction. Stay tuned!
underConstruction.message: <container><p1>Our engineers are working hard to get this page out soon.</p1><p2>In the meantime, <underlineLink><linkHome>enjoy our app!</linkHome></underlineLink></p2></container>

root.subtitle1: DcaPal helps you keep your portfolio under control with tax-efficient suggestions for your monthly investments.
root.title2: Your smart assistant for allocating your monthly savings
root.subtitle2: <p1>Keeping your portfolio well-balanced is tough. <it>We know how it is</it>.</p1><p2>You do your asset allocation on day-one, market goes up and down and you get lost on how to split your monthly savings.</p2><p3>DcaPal takes care of that for you.</p3>
root.cardStep1: <p1><bold>Build your portfolio</bold> and define your asset allocation</p1>
root.cardStep4: <p1>Discover <bold>how much to invest </bold> on each asset and go to market</p1>
root.getStart: <p1>Get started now. It's free!</p1><p2>We built DcaPal as quick tool for passive investors. Get your allocation done in minutes.</p2><p3>No registration required!</p3>
